sentence.value: He was serving as an experimental test pilot at the Air Force Flight Test Center, Edwards AFB, California when selected for the X-20 Dyna-Soar program.

sentence.value: Wood was the senior test pilot on the Dyna-Soar project and was slated to be the pilot on its first sub-orbital mission.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Wood was the senior [[test pilot|Test_pilot]] on the Dyna-Soar project and was slated to be [[the pilot|Test_pilot]] on its first sub-orbital mission.

sentence.value: After the Dyna-Soar program was cancelled on December 10th,1963, he remained with the U.S. Air Force and served as Commander of Test Operations at Edwards Air Force Base.
